pr_title: Records contains the version of the broker

timeline.message:
feat(broker): records with broker version

* add the version of the broker to the record metadata that wrote the record
* expose the version in the exporter API
* add a new property in the ES record template

timeline.bodyText: I wrote this test in the broker because some records are written from broker code (e.g. deployments, user commands, message subscription records, etc.).
timeline.author: saig0

timeline.bodyText: The protocol version is always set then calling metadata.reset().
timeline.author: saig0

timeline.bodyText: If it reads a record from a previous version then decoder.brokerVersion() returns null.
timeline.author: saig0

timeline.bodyText: By default, it set the current version. So, we don't need to set the version explicitly when using the log stream writer.
timeline.author: saig0
